ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: Have at least four carnivores and six herbivores in a savannah exhibit
Oh nee! You did not meet the requirements for the number of carnivores and herbivores!
Goed gedaan! You have met the initial requirements for the savannah carnivores and herbivores!
Run the savannah exhibit for four months without getting any herbivores injured
Oh nee! One of your carnivores have killed a herbivore.
Goed gedaan! You have managed to run the savannah exhibit without any herbivores getting injured!
